articles.title: Dire wolves and saber-toothed cats may have gotten arthritis as they inbred themselves to extinction - Livescience.com
articles.description: Bones from the two ancient predatory species were found in the La Brea tar pits in what is now West Hollywood and showed signs of bone disease not normally seen in wild animals.
